title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: Factory Girl
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens, Meghan O'Rourke, and Julia Turner discuss Factory Girl, a biopic about Edie Sedgwick and Andy Warhol. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the show.
